tool_description:
By using the Google News API, which is a straightforward REST API, you may look through over 1,000,000 news sources, both current and archived. You may also aggregate and arrange today's most talked-about news stories in accordance with Google News's rating with the help of this news API. You can also use filters and a keyword search to sift through all the articles.

We have compiled tens of millions of articles from over 250,000 sources in ten different languages for inclusion in our databa...
name: Google News API
title: Google News API

api_list.name: Get articles
api_list.description: Get, filter, smart search google news articles.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description:
Supported by 10 languages. 

Language request codes:

    TR, EN, FR, DE,  IT, ZH, ES, RU, KO, PT

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
You can arrange the articles systematically in groups; separate according to type, class, etc.

Sorting refers to ordering articles in an increasing or decreasing manner according to some linear relationship among the article items. You can order the articles and arrange them in a sequence ordered by category with similar properties.

Expected values:

date:asc
date:desc

_score:asc
_score:desc

parameters.name: required_props
parameters.description:
Required props are delimited by commas. Each property must have a name. If one of the property names is missing from the article, that property is excluded.

Example:

title, image

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: This defines the returned value of the \\\"next_cursor\\\". It allows you to navigate to next article list.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
\\\"to\\\" when used defines the date of items published before the specified date.

Format:
ISO date standart format is used. 
YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss

Example:
2022-10-17T18:41:34.306Z

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: With \\\"limit,\\\" you can specify the number of articles required per request. Maximum limit is set to 100 articles per request.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
\\\"from\\\" when used defines the date of items published after the specified date.

Format:
ISO date standart format is used. 
YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss

Example:
2022-10-17T18:41:34.306Z

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
The search term or terms used to locate the article.

\\\"AND\\\" or \\\"OR\\\" may be placed between the keywords.

If you wish to group the keywords, you may include them in parenthesis.

For instance: (cats and dogs) OR (fish)

If you wish to omit articles by term, you can do so by prefixing the keyword with a (-) sign.

Example: cats -dogs
(This will return articles featuring cats but exclude those with the term \\\"dog.\\\"

utterances.utterance: Find the latest news articles in English about climate change.
Show me French news articles about technology published after October 1st, 2023.
Get German news articles sorted by date in descending order.
Search for Spanish news articles about sports with titles and images.
Find Russian news articles about politics published before September 15th, 2023.
Get the top 50 Italian news articles about fashion.
Find Portuguese news articles about health excluding those mentioning COVID-19.
Show me Korean news articles about entertainment published between August 1st and August 31st, 2023.
Get Chinese news articles about education sorted by relevance in ascending order.
Find Turkish news articles about travel with titles, images, and published after July 1st, 2023.
